summary: In April, 1975, civil war breaks out; Beirut is partitioned along a Moslem-Christian line. Tarek is in high school, making Super 8 movies with his friend, Omar. At first the war is a lark: ... See full summary »
cast: Rami Doueiri|Naamar Sahli|Mohamad Chamas|Rola Al Amin|Carmen Lebbos|Joseph Bou Nassar|Liliane Nemri|Leïla Karam|Mahmoud Mabsout|Hassan Farhat|Fadi Abou Khalil|Abla Khoury|Aydah Sabra
title: West Beirut
